product_title: Alexa High Waist Raw Hem Crop Wide Leg Jeans
product_description: Retro wide-leg jeans with a super-high waist are cut from lightweight twill with sophisticated structure and a hint of stretch.
product_details_and_care:
Retro wide-leg jeans with a super-high waist are cut from lightweight twill with sophisticated structure and a hint of stretch.
26" inseam; 20" leg opening; 11" front rise; 14" back rise (size 29)
